sub_title: Senior Political Affairs Officer (Bilateral - EU), Embassy of Canada
summary: Experienced Political Policy Officer with a demonstrated history of working in international diplomacy and government relations (bilateral and EU), economics, and culture. Multilingual and international with degrees from Switzerland and the Netherlands.
